title: Idea of  keeping the rotating game mode in custom
body: What are your guys thoughts on having game modes like Urf, Ascension etc permanently in custom matches?

replies.body: Its good in thought, but in practice it wouldn't work since you'd wait forever
I mean like keep URF permanently open in Customs, I mean I guess it would damage the q times of other modes but it would give some people a reason to play League more
